schools.name: Purdue University
schools.degree: College of Science, Bachelor of Science Computer Science

lines.line: Helped to increase percentage of production code covered by unit and behavior tests by developing a code coverage tool integrated heavily with Github and Travis CI
Built the project for internal use, developed with Ruby on Rails and ReactJS + Flux.
Developed an internal automation framework for a social collaboration tool, with a team
Created several utilities still in use at the company, including a rewrite of their existing bug tracking software in AngularJS + node.js that was over 20x faster in performing search queries
Maintained large codebase and remotely implemented site features and bug fixes
Worked closely with other developers and attained a working knowledge of development lifecycle
Created several new websites and updated old sites for Net Literacy family of websites
Acted as Webmaster for their entire suite of websites

projects.name: Simple Shell
projects.desc: Fully featured shell featuring globbing, environmental variables, piping, and file redirection

projects.name: FIZ interpreter
projects.desc: Interpreter for a small lispy language called FIZ.

projects.name: Jeopardy Web App (www.austinschwartz.com/jeopardy)
projects.desc: Website where users can play games of Jeopardy with questions and categories pulled from past games (over 200,000 questions). Made with node.js, AngularJS, and MongoDB.
